com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan

Class DefaultPlanManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.DefaultObservable
      • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.ChainedObserver
        • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan.DefaultPlanManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable, Observer, PlanManager

    public class DefaultPlanManager
extends ChainedObserver
implements PlanManager
    Provides the default implementation of a PlanManager. Encapsulates the plan and a strategy for executing that plan.

      • getCandidates

        public java.util.Collection<? extends Step> getCandidates(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> dirtyAssets)
        Description copied from interface: PlanManager
        Determines the next Steps that should be considered for scheduling. Steps that are being selected by other PlanManagers are provided as dirtyAssets as a hint to this PlanManager to assist with scheduling.
        Specified by:
        getCandidates in interface PlanManager
        Parameters:
        dirtyAssets - Other Steps/assets that are already claimed for scheduling elsewhere
        Returns:
        One or more Steps that can be scheduled or an empty Collection when there is no Step to schedule, which may happen if for example all incomplete Steps are already being worked on by other PlanManagers

      • update

        Description copied from interface: PlanManager
        Notifies constituent elements of TaskStatus updates.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer
        Specified by:

        Overrides:
        update in class ChainedObserver
        Parameters:
        status - A TaskStatus from Mesos.

      • getDirtyAssets

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getDirtyAssets()
        Description copied from interface: PlanManager
        Returns a Set of assets that are dirty, i.e. being worked upon by the Plan that this PlanManager is working on.
        Specified by:
        getDirtyAssets in interface PlanManager
        Returns:
        A Set containing assets that are dirty
